sentences.en: an independent nation
sentences.cn: 独立的国家

sentences.en: Each nation has its own peculiarities when it comes to doing business.
sentences.cn: 谈到做生意，各国都有其独特之处。

sentences.en: He barnstormed across the nation, rallying the people to the cause.
sentences.cn: 他在全国四处游说，号召人们共赴大业。

sentences.en: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation.
sentences.cn: 他帮助激励和动员了全国数百万人。

sentences.en: He suggested that we suffer delusions of grandeur as a football nation.
sentences.cn: 他暗示我们妄自尊大地以为自己是个足球民族。

sentences.en: It was trumpeted that the nation's health was improving.
sentences.cn: 人们大力宣传该国的健康状况正在改善。

sentences.en: Italian football captured the imagination of the nation last season.
sentences.cn: 上个赛季意大利足球吸引了全国上下的注意。

sentences.en: one-nation Tories.
sentences.cn: 主张天下大同的托利党人。

sentences.en: The British are renowned as a nation of dog lovers.
sentences.cn: 英国人以爱犬而闻名。

sentences.en: the Cherokee nation
sentences.cn: 切罗基族

sentences.en: The nation's advertisers need to clean up their act.
sentences.cn: 该国的广告商需要规范自己的行为。

sentences.en: The nation's disposable earnings in 1987 amounted to £86 billion.
sentences.cn: 1987年国民可自由支配收入达到了860亿英镑。

sentences.en: The nation's economy is not out of the woods yet.
sentences.cn: 该国经济尚未摆脱困境。

sentences.en: The nation's highest court reversed the lower court's decision.
sentences.cn: 该国最高法院已推翻了下级法院的判决。

sentences.en: The nation's unemployment rate has been climbing steadily since last June.
sentences.cn: 自去年6月以来，该国的失业率一直在不断上升。

sentences.en: the President’s radio broadcast to the nation
sentences.cn: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.en: the world’s leading industrial nations
sentences.cn: 世界上的主要工业国

sentences.en: To force this agreement on the nation is transparently wrong.
sentences.cn: 把这一协定强加于全体国民显然是错误的。

sentences.en: Today he's still revered as the father of the nation.
sentences.cn: 现在，他仍被尊为国父。

sentences.en: Young people came from the four corners of the nation.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的年轻人都来到这里。

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家

trans.tran_en: a country, considered especially in relation to its people and its social or economic structure
